query:
ALTER TABLE templates 
DROP COLUMN type,
DROP COLUMN content,
ADD COLUMN applicableTypes JSON AFTER days,
ADD COLUMN isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE AFTER applicableTypes;
